[[עֶחֶם]] Ex 24:10 +; sf. [[עַחְמִי]] Job 19:20 +, etc.; pl. [[עֲחָמוֹת]] 2Ki 23:16 +; cstr. [[עַחְמוֹת]] Jos 24:22 +; sf. [[עַחְמׂתַי]] Job 4:14 +, etc.; also [[עֲחָמִים]] Ez Eze 24:4 +, sf. [[עֲחָמַי]] Ge 2:23 +, etc.;—

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: of living pers. Mic 3:2, Mic 3:3 (hyperb.), Job 10:11, Job 19:20, La 4:8, Ps 102:6, Ec 11:5 +; fig. of close relationship † [[עֶחָם מֵעֲחָמַי]] Ge 2:23, cf. Ge 29:14 (both J), Ju Jdg 9:2, 2Sa 5:1 = 1Ch 11:1, 2Sa 19:13, 2Sa 19:14 (all + [[בָּשָׂר]]).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: ´[[ע]] + [[בָּשָׂר]] = body, Job 2:5, pl. = bodily frame Je 20:9 (sim.), limbs, members, [[לַעֲחָמֶיהָ]] Ju Jdg 9:29 i.e. limb by limb (GFM); as seat of vigour Job 20:11, etc.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: (poet.) as seat of disease and pain Job 30:17, Job 30:30 and (esp. of personif. Isr.) Ps 22:15, Ps 31:1, Ps 102:4,  La 1:13, Hb Hab 3:16 +.

definitions.title: d.
definitions.body: pl. as representing entire person = one's whole being, (esp. of personif. Isr.) Ps 6:3 (‖[[נֶפֶשׁ]] v:Ps 6:4), Ps 35:10 (‖[[נֶפֶשׁ]] v:Ps 35:9), Is 66:14; of individ. (incl. physical and moral) Pr 3:8, Pr 14:30, Pr 15:30, Pr 16:24.

definitions.title: e.
definitions.body: sg. = external body La 4:7 Ew Th al., but dub.; Bi Bu bones (= branches) of coral ([[פְּנִינִים]]); Löhr [[עוֹרָם]] their skin.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: esp. of dead Nu 19:16, Nu 19:18 (P), Ez Eze 37:1 +; oft. (pl.) = remains Am 6:10, Ge 50:25, Ex 13:19, Ex 13:19, Jos 24:32 (all E) +.
bone of animal Ex 12:46, Nu 9:12 (both P); Ez Eze 24:4, Eze 24:5 (symbol.); of (living) hippopot. Job 40:18.
